Content: you may not be aware of that, if more miners are mining the SAME coin the less YOU will get. This is how it works, and when you feel you are not making enough to make profit or break even, you move on to another coin, this is called profit switching.

Author: Mark81#4505
Content: Maybe stupid question but why equihash coins need stratum pool setup when mining solo with GPU and ASICs? If i understand that bitcoin combatible coins can mine directly to Qt-client port but why this is not possible with equihash?

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content:
the political answer: because CPU mining and "external" mining are not the same thing
the apolitical answer: because Bitcoin Core and slush (the creator of "stratum") have a close relationship and getwork was removed from Core (and thus all forks of it) to benefit the existence of pools and the revenue of the original pool ops (like slush)

Author: Mark81#4505
Content: So it is not possible mine anymore with any modern fork of bitcoin? Thanks CG!

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: correct, you could recode your daemon and miner to use getwork again, but it requires deep knowledge of both the daemon code and cgminer code

Dear miner using address ``RLfaQRv***********************GbDjf`` to mine on UniMining.net pool

If you want to mine COMMOD, please use port 2146 instead
